title: 1882 Rhode Island gubernatorial election
text:
The 1882 Rhode Island gubernatorial election was held on April 5, 1882. Incumbent <a href="Republican%20Party%20%28United%20States%29">Republican</a> <a href="Alfred%20H.%20Littlefield">Alfred H. Littlefield</a> defeated <a href="Democratic%20Party%20%28United%20States%29">Democratic</a> nominee Horace A. Kimball with 64.78% of the vote.
General election.
